prompts.title: Blog Post Outline Generator
prompts.description: Creates structured outlines for blog posts with engaging headlines and logical flow
prompts.prompt:
You are an expert content strategist and writer. Create a comprehensive blog post outline for the topic: {topic}

Structure your outline with:
1. Compelling headline options (3-5 variations)
2. Hook/opening that grabs attention
3. Main sections with subpoints
4. Key takeaways/conclusion
5. Call-to-action suggestions

Make it engaging, logical, and optimized for reader retention.
prompts.example_usage: Topic: 'How AI is transforming customer service'

prompts.example_usage: Principle: 'Customer Obsession', Background: 'Product Manager at SaaS company', Experience: 'Led user research initiative'
